text:
If the Apache resolver lib is missing, the current diagnostics don't really tell
you why - even if resolver.jar is in your classpath, there might have been some
linkage error. (For example, Ant built *without* resolver.jar in the classpath
will not use if it is *run* with it, but the message hardly tells you this.)

This is a simple patch to add the text of the actual exception at DEBUG level,
which should be enough to diagnose the common cases quickly.
creator: jesse.glick@netbeans.com
jesse.glick@netbeans.com
text:
Created attachment 6920
Suggested patch (against CVS head)
